issue_title: Deprecate osx_profile resource since it can longer silently install profiles
summary: There is a suggestion to fully remove a certain feature without any deprecation notice, as Chef only supports macOS 12 and higher. The resource related to this feature will cause Chef to fail on a supported version of macOS if not explicitly marked with `ignore_failure true`. The current version of macOS that will reach its end-of-life soon is Apple macOS 11.
